pageTitle: Itinerary for Wednesday, November 29, 2017 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Wednesday, November 29, 2017:

Ottawa, Ontario  

10 a.m. The Prime Minister will attend the National Caucus meeting.

2 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend Question Period.

3 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend a ceremony to pay tribute to Special Olympics athletes in the House of Commons.

3:35 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend a reception for Special Olympics athletes and deliver remarks.

Room 237-C, Centre Block
Parliament Hill

Note for media:

  • Open coverage for remarks
